amuse.interfaces.nodes
Class NodeScheduler

java.lang.Object
  amuse.interfaces.nodes.NodeScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeEventSource, NodeSchedulerInterface, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassifierNodeScheduler, ExtractorNodeScheduler, OptimizerNodeScheduler, ProcessorNodeScheduler, TrainerNodeScheduler, ValidatorNodeScheduler
public abstract class NodeScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeSchedulerInterface, java.lang.Runnable, NodeEventSource

All node schedulers should extend this class

Version:
$Id: NodeScheduler.java 1130 2010-07-02 11:42:32Z vatolkin $

Igor Vatolkin
